banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Perfectionism holds us back. Here's why
videoData.socialTitle: Perfectionism holds us back. Here's why

nodes.whoTheyAre: As a reformed perfectionist and former professional athlete, Charly Haversat began noticing that we spend a lot of our personal and professional lives on being flawless. But her big question is: As we obsess about perfection, are we actually getting anything done? A vice president in Alternative Investment Solutions, she focuses on designing scalable, cost-effective programs that meet both our business needs and our clients’ expectations.

videoData.description: If you can't do it perfectly, why do it at all? Recovering perfectionist Charly Haversat challenges our obsession with perfection in our personal lives, workplaces and beyond. Can we fight the crippling fear of failure and the unwillingness to compromise that it creates?
videoData.socialDescription: If you can't do it perfectly, why do it at all? Recovering perfectionist Charly Haversat challenges our obsession with perfection in our personal lives, workplaces and beyond. Can we fight the crippling fear of failure and the unwillingness to compromise that it creates?
